contest-event.event-date:
July 16, 1927 D Oxfordshire & District Contest (Section 2)
Oxfordshire & District Contest (Section 2) 20 Test Piece Contest Oxfordshire & District Contest oxfordshire-district-contest-section-2
None
Acis and Galatea [arr. Godfrey]
White House Ground, Abingdon Road, Oxford, Oxfordshire, UK Open to "Class A" Oxford association bands. 3 bands entered.
1st prize: Frank Gray Challenge Shield, £10 2nd prize: £5 3rd prize: £2.10.0 Medals for best solo cornet, flugel , tenor horn, baritone, euphonium. Silver medal with gold centre for bandmaster and secretary of 1st placed band.
March 23, 2017, 10:50 a.m. March 29, 2017, 10:54 a.m.
1 Morris Motors Band Fred Dimmock
2 City of Oxford Silver Band Frank Brooks
Unknown Result Marlow Town Band G. Pettergill
